<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Coating of Slime](/Feats.aspx?ID=2526) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

An acidic ooze coats your limbs. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4 [persistent acid damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) on a critical hit.
name: Coating of Slime
